subject: How to split a large string with repeating delimiters into multiple substrings
body:
Hi All,

I am new to Perl.

How can I split the below string and get the multiple
web-addresses in a list: (i.e. the strings between 
and 
http://view-preprod.admission.net/abc/mactive/_NJMG_0002029003-01/i-1.JPG?t=tr/m:FitPad/w:199/h:124&t=ts/r:199x199http://view-preprod.admission.net/abc/mactive/_NJMG_0002029003-01/i-1.JPG?t=tr/m:FitPad/w:199/h:124&t=ts/r:199x199


Any help is appreciated.

Regards,
Michael
